title: President Rajapaksa and the Government deplores the beheading of Miss RizanaNafeek
content: It has been confirmed that Miss RizanaNafeek was beheaded by Saudi authorities this morning at Dawadmy, Saudi Arabia. The Sri Lankan housemaid was employed for less than 6 weeks in 2005 when she was charged by her Saudi employer for allegedly killing their infant while she was bottle feeding and thereafter sentenced to death in…
